history.message: • Lisboa → del 17/10/2025 al 22/10/2025 (2 segmentos, creado el 15/10/2025)
No voy a ir a este viaje

📍 Lugares recomendados en Ir:
• Kandolus — Museum". Deputy of research and technology. Retrieved 14 October 2024. "Visit enchanting Kandolus village, a UNESCO nominee". newspaper.irandaily.ir.
• Kelardasht — visitors trying to escape the heat of Tehran and points further south. Its attractions include Alamkuh Mountain (the second tallest peak in Iran at 4850m),
• Tomb of Two Kamals — a museum, a library, and other places which commemorate the legacies of the artists buried therein. niafam.com. "Tomb of Two Kamals". en.icro.ir. Retrieved
• Catholic Church of Tabriz — Board, East Azerbaijan Geography, Iranian Ministry of Education, 2000 (High School Text Book in Persian) http://www.eachto.ir Portal: Iran v t e v t e
• Zibad — Organization of Iran as a national natural monument and is a major tourist attraction with a height of 20 metres and with a perimeter of 6.5 meters (21 ft)

🧭 Resumen: IR or Ir may refer to:

🗓️ Plan 72h:
 Día 1: Visita Tomb of Two Kamals; Visita Catholic Church of Tabriz
 Día 2: Visita Mausoleum of Poets; Visita Kelardasht
 Día 3: Visita Catholic Church of Tabriz; Visita Kelardasht
